plot: Ex-actor turned commando Andy Frazer is one of a few army men that can be brought back to life by the Death Rising Department. A reality with which his soul will struggle more and more.
title: Radical Rifle Icon
plot_es: Ex-actor turned commando Andy Frazer is one of a few army men that can be brought back to life by the Death Rising Department. A reality with which his soul will struggle more and more.
plot_en: Ex-actor turned commando Andy Frazer is one of a few army men that can be brought back to life by the Death Rising Department. A reality with which his soul will struggle more and more.
